name: Mekafusion #16 MW-BROADSWORD
description:
⚔ Description:

Model: MW-BROADSWORD ( Meta Weapon - HEAVY BROADSWORD )
Series: BLADE

★ Properties
• Type: Meta Weapon
• Skills: Smites at its marked target.
• Perks: Wielder can possess incredible strength.

A Meta Weapon in BLADE series. A Sentient Relic with its own Artificial Intelligence, able to float and smite its direction. Only its chosen champion can grant its power.

⚔ The Project - Mekafusion [ Mekanic Fusion ] 
An alliance between Meka and Meta to join forces to form ultimate mechanical robotic machines in different series in the Metaverse.

These are digitally hand-drawn in 2D artwork to make Robotic Figures 'Mekanoid'. The concept comes in different series to give mechas their Artificial Intelligence to create their own character and make lots of unique Mekafusions.

The goal is to make robot designs as it was been my childhood hobby to draw robots. Now minted in Tezos blockchain as Non-fungible Tokens (NFT) to give opportunities to art collectors and traders. Video is created in 4096x4096 pixel HD resolution at 60 fps to satisfy its quality into an iconic figure.

You can visit me on my Twitter page as the creator of Mekafusion - @XTZverse

★★★★★
Check out the website for more information at mekafusion.com
